name: Deeper
description:
“DEEPER” is cave diving exploration game. The goal is to retrieve 3
treasures from the bottom of the cave before you run out of air.

Note: Getting all 3 treasures is hard, but not impossible. For best effect full screen and headphones are recommended.

Tips:

  • Bubbles always go up.
  • Not rushing and planning are keys to success.

Audio samples from:

https://freesound.org/people/HDVideoGuy/sounds/156011/

https://freesound.org/people/monica137142/sounds/211389/

https://freesound.org/people/scratchikken/sounds/115609/

https://freesound.org/people/josepharaoh99/sounds/367125/

Unity:

“Advanced Polygon Collider” Unity Store
